message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can we meet in the middle?
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but the value of this product to me is quite high. How about we settle at $13,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. How about we try $11,500? I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer
